DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics multiple administered DWP05195 healthy volunteer
DOC.brief_title: A Multiple Dose Study DWP05195 Healthy Adult Subjects
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy adult male subject age 20 45 year 2 . The subject Body weight ≥50 kg < 90 kg Body Mass Index ( BMI ) ≥19.0 kg/m2 < 27.0 kg/m2 . 3 . A subject provide write informed consent participate study cooperative regard compliance study relate constraint 4 . A Subject judge healthy investigator participate study base screen result ( accord standard reference index update recently ) 1 . A subject sign symptom previously diagnose disease respiratory , cardiovascular , endocrinology , liver , kidney , gastrointestinal , hematology , neurology psychology function significant diseases history suspicion current drug abuse alcohol abuse 2 . A subject allergic history drug ( prescription drug OTC medication etc . ) 3 . A subject receive treatment list drug within specified period prior first dose study medication Within last 1 month : drug food know CYP1A2 inducer inhibitor Within 2 week : Prescribed herbal Nonprescribed medicine Within 3 day : Consumption grapefruit juice/grapefruit contain product orange juice/orange containing product , garlic extract functional food Within 3 day : Consumption alcohol caffeine 4 . A subject participate clinical study within last 12 week 5 . A subject 400mL blood sample ( whole blood plasma donation , etc . ) within last 12 week 6 . A Subject know evidence follow infection drug abuse HIV , HBs , HCV cannabinoid , opioid , amphetamine , cocaine , barbiturate , benzodiazepine 7 . Smoker smoke cessation within 1 month exsmoker positive result cotinine test 8 . AST ALT great 1.5 time upper limit reference range QTc > 430 msec base screen result 9 . Blood pressure : SBP≥140mmHg , DBP≤85mmHg 10 . A subject judge ineligible investigator participate study reason contain clinical laboratory test
